#settings

= Available Settings =

All Settings can be defined in your projects settings-file (settings.py) or the !FileBrowsers settings-file (fb_settings.py). When using the projects settings-file, you have to use the prefix "FILEBROWSER_" for every setting (e.g. FILEBROWSER_PATH_SERVER instead of PATH_SERVER).

----
==== URL_WWW ====
The location for your media-files. This is the initial directory for the !FileBrowser.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: settings.MEDIA_URL + 'uploads/'_
----
=== URL_ADMIN ===
The !FileBrowser Admin-URL.

  * *Required*
  * Default: /admin/filebrowser/
----
=== URL_HOME ===
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: /admin/_
----
=== PATH_SERVER ===
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: /admin/_
----
=== PATH_FILEBROWSER_MEDIA ===
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== PATH_TINYMCE ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== EXTENSIONS ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== THUMB_PREFIX ===
  * The prefix for your thumbnals. If you have an Image called "myimage.jpg", your thumbnail will be called "thumb_myimage.jpg" by default.
  * Note: This Thumbnail is for diplaying your Image within the Admin-Interface. It´s not intended to use this Thumbnail on your Website (use "Image Generator" instead).
  * Default: thumb_
----
=== THUMBNAIL_SIZE ===
  * The size of your thumbnails for the Admin-Interface.
  * Note: This Thumbnail is for diplaying your Image within the Admin-Interface. It´s not intended to use this Thumbnail on your Website (use "Image Generator" instead).
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== IMAGE_GENERATOR_DIRECTORY ===
  * The postfix for your "Image Versions"-directory. If you Upload an Image called "myimage.jpg", your versions-directory will be called "myimage_jpg_versions" by default.
  * Default: _versions
----
=== IMAGE_GENERATOR_LANDSCAPE ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== IMAGE_GENERATOR_PORTRAIT ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
=== IMAGE_CROP_GENERATOR ===
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
